TopicTitle: Could someone check to see if on-rails warping allows antenna to transmit in stock?

Articles.Content:
I just launched a craft and did some science on the way up but could not transmit as my antenna was stowed. I got into orbit and as the fairing is for aerobraking at Eve the antenna was still stowed. I warped a bit and the antenna started transmitting. When I stopped warping it stopped.

Could someone who plays stock check to see if this happens on a stock game please?

Just wondering if this is a stock bug or if it is due to me running loads of mods.

This sounds like it could be related to clipping in some way. The same way timewarp allows two physical bodies to pass through each other. It is skipping the checks against your fairings. This is just a hunch of course ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
It happened to me too, but i'm playing with mods, though not a lot. Antennas can't transmit while in fairings, but time warp kind of messes things up XD
